articles.description: President Donald Trump didn't shut down seeking a third term but also said he didn't believe in using "loopholes" to achieve that in a new interview.
articles.content: President Donald Trump said he didn't believe in using "loopholes" to seek a third term in office during an interview with Time Magazine published Friday, although he still didn't shut down the idea … [+2546 chars]
